explains: n. 布雷区；充满隐伏危险的事物

sentences.en: The whole subject is a political minefield.
sentences.cn: 整个话题成了一个政治雷区。

sentences.en: They were skirmishing close to the minefield now.
sentences.cn: 他们当时正在雷区附近小规模交火。

sentences.en: Legal consequences of attempts at biological control present a potential minefield.
sentences.cn: 尝试进行生物防治的法律后果是一个潜在的雷区。
